name: 王雨晴
bio_zh: 我目前是西北工业大学自动化学院的三年级（2023年-至今）博士研究生，师从张鼎文教授，我的研究兴趣包括多模态图像融合，医学图像分析，多模态大模型分析。
bio_en: I am currently a third-year(2023-Now) Ph. D. student in the School of Automation at Northwestern Polytechnical University, under the supervision of Professor Dingwen Zhang. My research interests include multimodal image fusion, medical image analysis, and multimodal large-scale model analysis.
research_interests: 多模态融合、医学图像、多模态大模型
